name: Postpartum_SNOMED
title: Postpartum_SNOMED
description: b.well created value set by Sr. Clinical Business Analyst for Postpartum.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The intent of this value set is for the purpose of defining the clinical codes that constitute Postpartum for inclusion and utilization in patients/users connected heath.),(Data Element Scope: Postpartum for b.well.),(Inclusion Criteria: Postpartum Codes that constitute the Active Pregnancy for b.well.),(Exclusion Criteria: N/A)

concept.display: Cytologic pattern compatible with postpartum state (morphologic abnormality)
Pain during postpartum period due to and following cesarean section (finding)
Varicose veins of vulva in puerperium (disorder)
Varicose veins of perineum in puerperium (disorder)
Varicose veins of bilateral lower limbs in puerperium (disorder)
Thrombophlebitis of bilateral lower limbs in puerperium (disorder)
Thrombus of dural sinus in puerperium (disorder)
Compression suture of uterus for postpartum hemorrhage (procedure)
Postpartum hemorrhage due to total placenta previa (disorder)
Collection of blood from umbilical cord immediately after delivery (procedure)
Pressure collapse of lung due to anesthesia in puerperium (disorder)
Infection caused by Neisseria gonorrhoeae during puerperium (disorder)
Acute deep vein thrombus during postpartum period (disorder)
Chronic deep vein thrombosis during postpartum period (disorder)
Benign essential hypertension complicating pregnancy, childbirth and the puerperium with postnatal complication (disorder)
Maternal tuberculosis during pregnancy, childbirth and the puerperium (disorder)
Pelvic soft tissue abnormality in pregnancy, childbirth and the puerperium with postnatal complication (disorder)
Postpartum coagulation defects with postnatal problem (disorder)
Toxic reaction caused by local anesthesia during puerperium (disorder)
Spinal and epidural anesthesia-induced headache during the puerperium (disorder)
Puerperal cerebrovascular disorder with antenatal complication (disorder)
Puerperal cerebrovascular disorder with postnatal complication (disorder)
Retraction of nipple in pregnancy, the puerperium or lactation (finding)
Retraction of nipple in pregnancy, the puerperium or lactation with postnatal complication (finding)
Galactorrhea in pregnancy and the puerperium with postnatal complication (disorder)
Varicose veins of genitalia in puerperium (disorder)
Varicose veins of vagina in puerperium (disorder)
Pre-existing hypertension complicating AND/OR reason for care during puerperium (disorder)
Hypertensive heart disease complicating AND/OR reason for care during puerperium (disorder)
Benign essential hypertension complicating AND/OR reason for care during puerperium (disorder)
Dehiscence AND/OR disruption of uterine wound in the puerperium (disorder)
Postpartum examination and care of mother (procedure)
Control of hemorrhage in postpartum uterus (procedure)
Dilation and curettage of uterus after delivery (procedure)
Hypertension secondary to renal disease complicating AND/OR reason for care during puerperium (disorder)
Disruption of episiotomy wound in the puerperium (disorder)
Knowledge level: postpartum maternal health (observable entity)
Secondary perineal tear in the puerperium (disorder)
Home visit for postpartum care and assessment (procedure)
Postpartum exploration of uterus using instrument (procedure)
Tobacco use in mother complicating puerperium (finding)
Tobacco smoking in mother complicating puerperium (finding)
Vaginal delivery with forceps including postpartum care (procedure)
Hypertensive renal disease complicating AND/OR reason for care during puerperium (disorder)
Disruption of perineal laceration repair in the puerperium (disorder)
Hypertension in the puerperium with pulmonary edema (disorder)
Compression suturing of uterus for atonic postpartum hemorrhage (procedure)
Education about breast care during postpartum period (procedure)
Cardiac complication of anesthesia during the puerperium (disorder)
Central nervous system complication of anesthesia during the puerperium (disorder)
Quantity of postpartum maternal blood loss (observable entity)
Sequela of complication of pregnancy childbirth and the puerperium (disorder)
Postpartum transection of fallopian tube by vaginal approach (procedure)
Postpartum hemorrhage co-occurrent and due to uterine rupture following obstructed labor (disorder)
Postpartum transection of fallopian tube by abdominal approach (procedure)
